dcterms:creator: S. G. Armato III
G. McLennan
L. Bidaut
M. F. McNitt-Gray
C. R. Meyer
dcterms:description: The Lung Image Database Consortium (LIDC) dataset contains 1,018 chest CT scans with lung nodules, annotated for size and attenuation to facilitate training of generative models for lung nodule detection.
dcterms:title: Lung Image Database Consortium (LIDC)
